room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: We had a great time playing the Submarine. Without to many spoilers -- the part where you have to navigate the Submarine is great! I recommend better lighting and puzzles to be logically connected.

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: My friend and I had a fantastic time escaping the Submarine yesterday with a bunch of strangers. We all worked very well together even though we were three separate groups. The different skills sets we brought to the game enabled us to solve multiple clues at the same time and we communicated and collaborated on everything. Can't wait to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: great room, got suck on the very last part but was a great experience, lots of yelling! :D

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: This trip we did "The Clock Tower" and "Submarine". Escape the room NYC has really stepped up their game with these two rooms. Well worth the cost of admission. Highly recommend these 2 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: A really fun and unique experience! It was really fun pretending to be on a real underwater submarine. Don't be scared to try the challenge with a couple friends and some strangers!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: Booked this as a surprise for myself and two of the girls - loved it all! The vibe was brilliant and the game well set up! Would recommend this to anyone going to NYC! Just be prepared to feel frustrated when you find out the answers and that you should've managed to escape!!
